prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (rugged muscular middle-aged man:1.2), piercing blue eyes, (long flowing messy hair:1.1), determined expression, outdoor sun lighting
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (weathered sun-damaged skin:1.2), individual hair strands, (matching heavy canvas fabric texture on hat:1.3), source palette preservation, identical color matching, realistic shadows, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, smooth hair, airbrushed, low quality, feminine features, (clean skin:1.2)
